hero.title: Global experience — in one place
hero.subtitle: The Expo is an international forum uniting major experts, investors, and leading companies. Exchange experience, build new connections, and shape the future together.

stats.title: TIFW in Numbers
stats.description: The International Week of Innovation and Technology (TIFW) is a large-scale platform for sharing knowledge, ideas, and experience among experts, companies, and investors from all over the world.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a team of professionals united by a common goal: to make TIFW the main platform for the development of innovation and technology.

venue.description: TIFW is held at a modern exhibition complex equipped with all necessary facilities for participants and visitors.

points: By car: free parking is available from Amir Temur Avenue

hero.title: Financial innovations
hero.subtitle: Join global leaders, investors, and innovators shaping the future of finance in Tashkent.

about.title: About the Week
about.text: Tashkent International Finance Week brings together the region’s leading events in finance, insurance, and fintech. It serves as a hub for collaboration among innovators, experts, and institutions. The platform fosters knowledge exchange, sustainable growth, and digital transformation.

event.title: Event highlight
event.description: Experience the vision, innovation, and collaboration of Tashkent International Finance Week. From global insights to real-world solutions — discover what makes this platform a defining moment for the region’s financial future.

speakers.title: Speakers
speakers.description: Tashkent International Finance Week brings together leading voices — visionaries shaping the future of finance, insurance, and technology. Each speaker shares practical insights, inspiring ideas, and strategies that drive real progress across the region.

participants-info.title: Our Participants
participants-info.text: Tashkent International Finance Week brings together visionaries from across Central Asia — financiers, policymakers, entrepreneurs, and innovators. Together, they represent the driving force behind a smarter, more connected financial future built on collaboration, innovation, and trust.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.location: Location: Tashkent, Central House of Entrepreneurs

events.subtitle: Kick off the National Insurance week!

participants.title: Our Participants
participants.description: Tashkent International Finance Week is supported by leading institutions united by one vision — to foster innovation and shape the future of finance in Central Asia. Together, we’re building a sustainable ecosystem where ideas evolve into real impact.

events.title: Events
events.text: TIFW events bring together a series of specialized exhibitions and forums, focusing on key areas of modern economy and technology. Here, leaders from various industries, investors, and startups gather to discuss trends, share experiences, and find new growth points.

participants.text: The TIFW Innovation week brings together a series of specialized exhibitions and forums, focusing on key areas of modern economy and technology. Here, leaders from various industries, investors, and startups gather to discuss trends, share experiences, and find new growth points.

banner.name: Aleksey Morozov
banner.title: Inspiration is the start of every success
banner.text: At this stage, speakers are not just speakers — they are people who shape the future. Their experience and ideas inspire others to move forward. Our goal is to pass on this inspiration to every participant.

media.title: Media center
media.subtitle: Explore official news, brand updates, press materials, and storytelling from the Forest universe. Stay connected with our latest launches, collaborations, and industry insights.

accreditation.title: Media accreditation
accreditation.subtitle: Apply for press access to our events and brand activities. Accredited media partners receive verified entry, exclusive content, and official resources.

items.title: Dear Representatives of the Mass Media
items.text: In accordance with the legislative requirements of the Republic of Uzbekistan, the decision on the accreditation of temporary foreign correspondents may take up to two weeks.

items.title: All media representatives will be notified of the accreditation decision by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
items.text: Representatives of the mass media, who are not accredited in Uzbekistan, must be accredited by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

accreditation.available: The accreditation procedure for representatives of foreign countries in Uzbekistan is available here:

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Welcome to TIFW! By accessing or using this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using our site.

items.title: Use of the Website
items.subtitle: The Expo Bank Exhibition is a premier international event uniting banking institutions from Uzbekistan and around the globe under one roof. As a dynamic platform for collaboration, innovation, and growth, the exhibition serves as a gateway to the future of banking and financial services.
bullets: You must be at least 18 years to use this website.
You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit the use of this website by any third party
Unauthorized use of this website may give rise to a claim for damages or be a criminal offense.

items.title: Intellectual Property Rights
bullets: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, images, logos, and code, is owned by or licensed to [Your Company Name].
You may not reproduce, distribute, or otherwise exploit any content on this website without prior written consent from us.

items.title: User Account
bullets: If you create an account on our website, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms.

items.title: Registration and Ticketing
bullets: Registration for the exhibition may require you to provide accurate and complete information about yourself or your organization.
Ticket purchases are non-refundable unless the event is canceled or postponed by the organizers.
We reserve the right to refuse admission or cancel registrations that do not comply with our policies.

items.title: Privacy and Data Protection
bullets: We are committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
Your data will be used solely for purposes related to the exhibition, including registration, communication, and event management.
For more information on how we handle your data, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

items.title: Limitation of Liability
bullets: We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy or completeness of the website's content.
To the fullest extent permitted by law, we exclude all liability for any direct, indirect, or consequential loss arising from your use of this website.
We are not responsible for any losses arising from technical issues, interruptions, or unauthorized access to the website.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.subtitle: At TIFW, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, store, and protect your data when you use our website and services.

items.title: Information We Collect
items.subtitle: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services, ensure security, and enhance your experience at the TIFW exhibition.
bullets: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number, company name, job title)
Registration and ticketing information for exhibition attendance
Technical data including IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies
Communication preferences and correspondence with our team

items.title: How We Use Your Information
bullets: To process your registration and manage your attendance at the exhibition
To communicate with you about the event, including updates, reminders, and promotional materials
To improve our website functionality and user experience
To comply with legal obligations and prevent fraudulent activities
To analyze attendance patterns and gather insights for future events

items.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
bullets: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties
We may share your information with event sponsors and exhibitors only with your explicit consent
We may disclose information to service providers who assist in operating our website and conducting the exhibition
We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights and safety

items.title: Data Security
bullets: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction
All sensitive data is encrypted during transmission using SSL/TLS technology
Access to personal information is restricted to authorized personnel only
Despite our efforts, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security

items.title: Your Rights and Choices
bullets: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time
You can opt-out of receiving promotional communications by following the unsubscribe instructions in our emails
You may request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
You have the right to lodge a complaint with the relevant data protection authority if you believe your rights have been violated

items.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
bullets: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze site traffic
You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences
We use analytics tools to understand how visitors interact with our website
Third-party services may also use cookies in accordance with their own privacy policies

items.title: Data Retention
bullets: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy
Registration and attendee data may be kept for up to 3 years after the event for record-keeping and future event planning
You may request deletion of your data at any time, subject to legal and contractual obligations

items.title: International Data Transfers
bullets: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of Uzbekistan
We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during international transfers
By using our website, you consent to the transfer of your information to other countries

items.title: Children's Privacy
bullets: Our website and services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children
If we become aware that we have collected data from a child, we will take steps to delete it promptly

items.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
bullets: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements
We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a revised effective date
Your continued use of the website after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy
We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically
